title: Kostas
creator_credit: Bernard Eddy, Videoscope Australia, Film Victoria and Paul Cox
brief_description: A lonely Melbourne divorcee falls in love with a Greek taxi driver. The film explores the path the romance follows, and how the couple overcome their differences of class and culture. Starring Wendy Hughes, Takis Emmanuel, Kris McQuade, Chris Haywood.
creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Eddy, Videoscope Australia, Film Victoria and Paul Cox
